page.title: 09HOUSING Pentney & Narboro'
page.content:
Much new building has taken place in {Narborough.}Old cottages have been replaced on a different site by the council and include old peoples homes. There have been three housing estates built for private occupation and a quantity of individual homes, and also two farmhouses and a new vicarage. Nearly all new homes are bungalows. Among the older buildings remaining are the Hall and Mill, both listed buildings. The Maltings closed but now house several new enterprises.
New building in{Pentney}is virtually unknown as it is not regarded as a growth area by the planners. Existing building is a mixture of all eras and is of ribbon type development rather than in estate form.
